alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 18 at 2:10PM EST until January 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches in the most persistent lake snows. The heaviest snow this evening will shift off the higher terrain more toward the lakeshore, including Oswego. * WHERE...Oswego county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible in the lake effect snow band with deep snow cover on roads and very poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Travel along Interstate 81 will be severely impacted between Watertown and Pulaski.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
